description: The Firebrand II Low Waterproof has all the versatility of the Sawtooth, but in a lower-volume profile. Its leather and abrasion-resistant mesh upper and molded rubber toe cap provide superior protection, while its Sawtooth midsole and outsole provide unbeatable comfort. Add our B-DRY Waterproof technology and this boot is ready for all conditions and all occasions.
name: Oboz Firebrand II Low B-Dry, Wide - Mens

specs.value: Waterproof Nubuck Leather + Abrasion-resistant Mesh, B-DRY Waterproof Membrane, Molded rubber toe cap & heel counter
Length runs true to size. Form hugging heel cup, sculpted mid-foot, and a wider forefoot & toe box
